member.name: T:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.IHostSearchUI
member.summary: Implemented by search window to expose functionality to ISearchHandler implementations.

member.name: T:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.IHostSetup
member.summary: Passed to IPlugin.Register() to give plugins a way to install themselves into the user interface.

member.name: T:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.IHostUI
member.summary: Provide plugins a way to access to the user interface and other services of the main window. An instance of this is passed to all plugin constructors, and many forms.

member.name: P:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.IHostUI.SplashImagePath
member.summary: Image to display on splash form at startup. Image will be stretched to 4:3 (width:height).

member.name: T:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.IPlugin
member.summary: All plugins must implement this interface, and contain a constructor that takes a single parameter of type IHostUI. Every class meeting these conditions, if it is also in an assembly marked with the "PluginAssembly" assembly level attribute and in the same folder as the main executing program, will be loaded into the main AppDomain at program startup and its Register() method called.

member.name: M:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.IPlugin.Register(Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.IHostSetup)
member.summary: Called to let the plugin wire itself into the software.

member.name: P:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.ISearchHandler.Name
member.summary: Name to show for this search method in the UI.

member.name: M:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.ISearchHandler.HandlerSelected(Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.IHostSearchUI)
member.summary: Called with the user picks this handler in the search user interface. Is responsible for configuring the UI for the selected type of search.

member.name: M:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.ISearchHandler.PrepareSearch(Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.IHostSearchUI)
member.summary: Read and validate all search parameters. Called by the UI when the user explicitly requests a search, not when the UI re-executes a search in response to an event such as changes to a register. Such a re-execution bypasses the call to this method and ProcessTrx() must use the same parameters last retrieved by blnPrepareSearch().
member.returns: Return true iff parameters are valid and search may proceed.

member.name: M:Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.ISearchHandler.ProcessTrx(Willowsoft.CheckBook.Lib.BaseTrx,Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.AddSearchMatchTrxDelegate,Willowsoft.CheckBook.PluginCore.AddSearchMatchSplitDelegate)
member.summary: Evaluate one BaseTrx for the search, and if the BaseTrx meets the conditions for being included in the search results then call one of the two delegates to include it. One delegate is used to report the BaseTrx as a whole, the other to report a single split in the BaseTrx.
